description: Hamsuke declares her love for another creature at a tea party with the Pleiades. Confused, the maids try to understand, but none recall such a creature in Nazarick. Seeking advice, Hamsuke turns to Albedo, who initially thinks it`s about Ainz. After discovering the truth, Albedo supports Hamsuke`s love interest. The maids set traps to capture the creature, who turns out to be Pandora`s Actor, Ainz`s creation. Unwilling to crush Hamsuke`s hope, Ainz arranges a meeting. However, Hamsuke changes her mind, preferring her Death Knight companion. The misunderstanding is cleared, and Ainz praises everyone`s efforts.

titles.title: Ple Ple Pleiades - Maju no Koi
Pure Pure Pleiades - A Magical Beast`s Love
ぷれぷれぷれあです - 「魔獣の恋」
